elements.name: Apache status
elements.description: Alarms on failure to reach the Apache status url

elements.description: Alert when many slow queries are reported

elements.description: Alarm on many messages in the queue

elements.description: Alarms when ntp falls 5 seconds out of sync

elements.name: Process not found
elements.description: No pids found for the process_name

elements.name: Apache no idle workers
elements.description: Alarms when there are no idle apache workers

elements.description: Time agent takes to collect metrics

elements.name: Monasca Agent emit time
elements.description: Time agent takes to send metrics to the api
